00025 #ifndef _BASE_QUOTIENTEXPRESSION_
00026 #define _BASE_QUOTIENTEXPRESSION_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/BinaryOpExpression>
00030 #include <base/SumExpression>
00031 
00032 namespace base {
00033 
00034 
00035 //
00036 // Sum operator - adds args
00037 //
00038 
00039 class QuotientExpression : public BinaryOpExpression 
00040 {
00041 public:
00042   QuotientExpression(ref<ExpressionNode> left, ref<ExpressionNode> right)
00043     : BinaryOpExpression(left, right) {}
00044   QuotientExpression(const QuotientExpression& e)
00045     : BinaryOpExpression(e) {}
00046 
00047   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewObj QuotientExpression(*this); }
00048   virtual String className() const { return String("QuotientExpression"); }
00049 
00050   virtual NodeType type() const { return NodeType(BinaryOp|Quotient); } 
00051 
00052   virtual ref<ExpressionNode> differentiate() const 
00053     { 
00054       //... check implementation (cut/pastes from Product) !!!      
00055       throw std::runtime_error(Exception("Quotient differentiate unimplemented")); 
00056       return ref<ExpressionNode>( NewObj SumExpression( ref<ExpressionNode>(
00057         NewObj ProductExpression( leftArg, rightArg->differentiate() )), ref<ExpressionNode>(
00058         NewObj ProductExpression( leftArg->differentiate(), rightArg ) ) ) ); }
00059 
00060   virtual String toString() const 
00061     { return  String("(")+leftArg->toString()+ "/"+rightArg->toString()+")"; }
00062 
00063 protected:
00064   virtual void cacheValue(const Vector& params) const
00065     { value = leftArg->evaluate(params) / rightArg->evaluate(params); valueCached=true; }
00066 
00067   virtual void operationCounts(Int& addsub, Int& multdiv, Int& trig) const 
00068     { BinaryOpExpression::operationCounts(addsub,multdiv,trig); multdiv++; }
00069   
00070 };
00071 
00072 } // base
00073 
00074 #endif
